title: List of nerfs and buffs for champions
body:
Welcome to my list of nerfs and buffs for champions. In this discussion, I'll include what I think should be nerfed and buffed and how it should be. Let's start.

{{champion:103}} **Ahri**
Ahri has always been a charming champion. However, her charm isn't really "charming".

E
NOT CHARMING ENOUGH: Width increased to 9000

****

{{champion:32}} **Amumu**
Amumu doesn't have friends. He would have one if Pantheon didn't block him.

W
YOU HAVE TO BE MY FRIEND NOW: Despair now ignores all protections (Pantheon's passive - Aegis protection, etc.)

****

{{champion:34}} **Anivia**
Anivia is underplayed, so a buff will be necessary in order to bring back her power.

Passive
I WILL BE REBORN AGAIN... AND AGAIN: Cooldown reduced to .69 seconds from 300 seconds

****

{{champion:1}} **Annie**

Annie is more of an assassin and evil little girl than a little mage who can be nice... or not. So we chose the evil side.

Q
TAG, YOU'RE IT: Her Q is now a global skill shot

R
TIBBERS, YOU'RE MY BEST FRIEND: Tibbers now strangles all enemies, dealing 1000 true damage to those that attempt to attack Annie.

****

{{champion:22}} **Ashe**

Since the Ashe rework, she has had her win rate dropped dramatically to .10%. We think that she could use more buffs.

Passive
NEVER RUN AWAY PLZ: Slow duration increased to 5 seconds
STOP IT PLZ: Slow increased to 90%

Q
READY, AIM, FIRE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!: Number of arrows increased to 99

E
WHO'S THERE: Number of maximum hawks increased to 5
COOLDOWN: 5 seconds per charge

****

{{champion:53}} **Blitzcrank**

Right now, Blitzcrank is more of an "I'm a robot and you can't stop me. Haw-haw-haw". He isn't really a support and more of a lane bully. So here is what will make him more of a "support".

PASSIVE
WHAT HAPPENED: Mana shield is no longer a thing
NEW PASSIVE: Blitzcrank falls down and laughs his *beep* off whenever he bullies someone in lane

Q
BUT I'M TOO LAZY TO GET IT: Hook length decreased to 20

W
WHY, I'M JUST SANIC: Movement and attack speed bonus removed
NEW ACTIVE: When Blitzcrank activates his command, he activates self-destruct mode. After 1 minute, he will instantly kill all champions on the map and cause an earthquake which has a 9000% (1000% of Blitzcrank's attack damage) of crashing summoners rift.

E
WANNA GO?: Blitzcrank's punch now pushes enemies off the map.

R
WHAT THE: His ult now takes a minute to a year to activate

****

{{champion:63}} **Brand**

Brand isn't really following his champion title.

PASSIVE
IT'S OVER 9000!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!: Now deals 9000 damage to enemies who laugh at Brand

R
WANNA KNOW UNFAIR, PAL?: Now possible to bounce infinitely

****

{{champion:51}} **Caitlyn**

Caitlyn isn't much of a sheriff, she's more of a "Come here so I can delete you".

PASSIVE
DON'T YOU DARE: Every shot will change the game music to Rick Roll.

More ridiculous buffs and nerfs coming soon!
